product_name: QLUR Water Bottle with Straw, 32oz Sports Motivational Water Bottle, 1L Tritan Water Bottle with Time Markings to Drink & Carry Strap, BPA Free, LeakProof for Women Men Gym Fitness Outdoor (1 Bottle)
description: Motivational Time Marker: QLUR 1 l Water Bottle as your daily partner is designed with motivational quotes by the hour, it keeps your daily water intake on track. The inspirational water bottle helps you stay hydrated throughout the day. BPA Free & Non-toxic: The reusable water bottles is made of food grade Tritan material--100% BPA free and non-toxic. The high quality tritan 32 oz water bottles can keep your safty. Sport water bottle does not generate odour, chemical or unpleasant taste. It suitable for 14°F~176°F. Easily Open & Leakproof: Our motivational water bottle flip-top lid is designed with a secure lock, which effectively preventing dust and leak-proof. It can be easily opened with one hand. Our 1 liter water bottle for school has a silicone nozzle with a straw inside to prevent turbulent water flow. Achieve all-day hydration spillproof. Portable Fashion Design: Our water bottle with straw is equipped with straw and a carry strap. And you also have a variety of colors to choose from. The wide mouth is easy to fit ice cubes and easy to clean. The clean brush coming with the water bottle is also a great cleaning partner. Idea Gifts: As a BPA-Free water bottle with time markings, we come with a cleaning brush and nice packaging. It's really a great gift for your families and friends as an excellent choice for fitness, gym, running, hiking, cycling, camping, and any other indoor or outdoor sports activities. Warm Tips: We recommend that you read the instructions carefully before use, if you have any questions, please contact us. we will respond the first time

latest_reviews.text: I bought two of these for a trip and I couldn’t be more pleased! These wash very well. I love the matte texture which makes them so nice to hold. The wrist strap is convenient. The locking mechanism is nice and the straw has a good feel. The colors are vivid and it is all very sturdy. I had no idea it came with a foam cleaner on a handle which was such a thoughtful addition! The motivation on the side is wonderful and helps make sure you get your hydration in. There are a lot of options in the market for things like this but this well exceeded my expectations and the price point was also very reasonable.

I had one of these bottles for over 2 years and unfortunately broke it, I purchased another one and find that the quality is even better than before. Love these water bottles. They have a wide mouth so it’s easy to clean, and love that it has a straw. Great quality for the price. Can’t go wrong. I put mine in the dishwasher as well and never had any issues. The label did start to peel but that didn’t matter.
